name: imGroupUpdate
description:
Update an [IM directory group](https://support.zoom.us/hc/en-us/articles/203749815-IM-Management) under your account.

**Scopes**: `imgroup:write:admin`
**[Rate Limit Label](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/rate-limits#rate-limits):** `Light`

groupId.description:
The group ID.
Can be retrieved by calling [GET /groups](https://marketplace.zoom.us/docs/api-reference/zoom-api/groups/groups).

name.description: Group name: must be unique to one account.

search_by_account.description: Members can search for others under same account.

search_by_domain.description: Members can search for others in the same email domain.

search_by_ma_account.description: Members can search for others under same master account, including all sub accounts.

type.description:
IM Group types:
`normal` - Only group members can automatically see others in their group. Other people can search for members in the group.
`shared` - Everyone under the account can see the group and members automatically.
`restricted` - Nobody can see the group or search for members except for the members in the group.
x-enum-descriptions: Only members can see the group automatically. Other people can search members in the group.
All people in the account can see the group and members automatically
Nobody can see the group or search members except the members in the group
